H0.text: who laid foundation stone of islamia college peshawar. Sir George Roos-Keppel

H1.text: who laid foundation stone of islamia college peshawar. Sir Sahibzada Abdul Qayyum Khan

H2.text: who laid foundation stone of islamia college peshawar. Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan

H3.text: who laid foundation stone of islamia college peshawar. Haji Sahib

A4.text: Haji Sahib was permitted to enter British controlled territory for the ceremony and spent the night in the 'Pokh' Mosque of Tehkal.

A5.text: Haji Sahib agreed to the request by Nawab Sir Sahibzada Abdul Qayyum to lay the foundation stone of Islamia College.
